name: Refresher Orb
description: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

abilities.name: Reset Cooldowns
abilities.description: Resets the cooldowns of all abilities of the wielder, as well as all item cooldowns within their inventory or backpack.
notes: Also resets all charges of charge-based abilities and items.
Does not affect charge-based items that do not have a charge replenish timer.
If the item is not in the owner's main inventory, its cooldown freezes completely, only continuing to tick down when entering the main inventory again.
Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
Resets Invoker's abilities that are currently not invoked.
Resets Kez's alternative skill set, even when currently not using that set.
Does not reset Rubick's previously stolen and used abilities that are no longer stolen.
Does not reset cooldowns of abilities acquired via Morphling while currently unmorphed, or his default abilities while currently morphed.
Does not reset Doom's previously acquired and used neutral creep abilities that are no longer there.
Does not reset the cooldown of Aghanim's Shard.
Visually resets the cooldown of Tranquil Boots, but does not skip the broken state.
Does not skip the fade delay for Riki's Cloak and Dagger.
The 'Channeled abilities require hold/stop to cancel' setting does not stop Refresher Orb from being cast while channeling.
